title: Bug 101187: Localization key cannot be blank when adding
description:
Bug 101187: Localization key cannot be blank when adding.

Description: When the key is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.

Steps to reproduce:
1. [Please provide the steps to reproduce the issue]
EB:
When the key is left blank in the properties file, but it has a valid value, the externalized text should still be displayed in the chart title.

Expected result: The externalized text is displayed in the chart title.

Actual result: The externalized text is not displayed.
